message.body: In a meeting. turning off til 130. Talk 2u then!
Hi, Wiegenlied. How's your day so far?
It's going quite well! What about yourself?
Not too bad, not all that great either.
harmony with the practices I've been using.
Are you managing to stay cool?
89° now! I'm sure glad the office has good A/C
Aye; I don't go out much and we just got a new AC installed. :)
Oh, that's good! I may be replacing the big old one that cools (tries to cool) my whole downstairs. - You work from home?
I notice (I think) your "handle"means lullaby. Which I like bc i've loved music all my life. My dad put a speaker in the room s, & he'd play records thr
Few people seem to know that. :) And that sounds wonderful! I loved music as a child as well; I was in choir from an early age as well. What sort of music are you into?
And I read a lot of SF from my mom's shelves. Put folk music & SF together &u get _filk_ music, which is mostly what I do.
